abilities.description: Dealing 3 damage per second, reducing armor by 3, and slowing movement speed by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts 3 seconds.

name: Orb of Corrosion
description: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.
trivia: Corrosion's debuff does not have its own particle system and uses the particle effects of Thunder Clap's slow debuff instead.
